topic.title: Axe Throwing
topic.shortdesc: This is my date idea for thrill-seeking couples or those who want a competitive game.

section.title: About
section.p: Blue Ridge Axe Throwing is the ultimate destination for adrenaline junkies. You will never be bored here, with an arcade, games, pinball, and most importantly: axe throwing! Impress your date by show off your pitching skills.Blue Ridge Axe Throwing ExteriorThe outside of the Blue Ridge Axe Throwing building, with a large blue sign.

section.title: Review
section.p: A recent addition to Blacksburg, this is one of the most exciting spots in town. I went with a couple of friends when it first opened and had a blast letting off some steam and sharing many laughs. You can walk-in if you're looking for last minute plans or reserve your own space ahead if you want some alone time.

section.title: Recommendation
section.p: Prepare for a competitive match of axe throwing! There will be a lot of tension in the room – whether it be from your date wanting to kiss you – or their determination to beat you. While Blue Ridge Axe Throwing generally isn't too busy, I recommend calling ahead to schedule your time slot and fill out your waiver to ensure there's no wait.
